channel.title: Interservice Communication Patterns on Graphene Loop
channel.description: Recent content in Interservice Communication Patterns on Graphene Loop

item.title: Synchronous Communication
item.description: Synchronous Communication between two systems means that the request will wait for response. Advantages: Disadvantages: HTTP/RESTful APIs gRPC GraphQL

item.title: Asynchronous Communication
item.description: Basis of Wifi Network Security Media Access Control (MAC) Address ifconfig you may see: eth0: A physical network card used for LAN Network used in wired connection. wlan0: A physical network adapter used for wireless connection. lo: loopback virtual network interface which lets you use the localhost. This will not have a MAC address. Note: You may see different names for the interface names. The following assumes the name of wireless interface as wlan0 for simplicity & clarity.

item.title: Support for Multiple Communication Patterns
item.description: Synchronous And Asychrnous with Messaging Queues Synchronous And Asychrnous using HTTP/RESTful APIs
